lead_paragraph: Anderson Silva, 40, who is considered one of the best fighters in the history of mixed martial arts, will fight for a spot on the Brazilian taekwondo team at the 2016 Olympics.

headline.print_headline: U.F.C. Star Trying Out in Taekwondo
headline.main: U.F.C. Star Trying Out in Taekwondo

snippet: Anderson Silva, 40, who is considered one of the best fighters in the history of mixed martial arts, will fight for a spot on the Brazilian taekwondo team at the 2016 Olympics.
abstract: Ultimate Fighting Championship star Anderson Silva says he will compete for spot on 2016 Olympic Brazilian taekwondo team.
